Package com.harmonia.backend.service

Class DirectMessageService

java.lang.Object
com.harmonia.backend.service.DirectMessageService
@Service public class DirectMessageService extends Object
Service class for managing direct messages.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Harmonia Team

  • Method Details

    • addDirectMessage

      public DirectMessage addDirectMessage(DMessageRequest dmessageRequest) throws Exception
      Adds a direct message to the database.
      Parameters:
      dmessageRequest - the request object containing the message details
      Returns:
      the created DirectMessage object
      Throws:
      Exception - if the message is blank or the author/recipient are missing

    • listMessages

      public Iterable<DmessageResponse> listMessages()
      Returns all direct messages in the database.
      Returns:
      an Iterable containing all direct messages

    • listDmessagesByRecipientId

      public Iterable<DmessageResponse> listDmessagesByRecipientId(Long recipientId)
      Returns all direct messages in the database with the specified recipient ID.
      Parameters:
      recipientId - the recipient ID to filter by
      Returns:
      an Iterable containing all direct messages with the specified recipient ID

    • listDmessagesByAuthorId

      public Iterable<DmessageResponse> listDmessagesByAuthorId(Long authorId)
      Returns all direct messages in the database with the specified author ID.
      Parameters:
      authorId - the author ID to filter by
      Returns:
      an Iterable containing all direct messages with the specified author ID

    • deleteDirectMessage

      public void deleteDirectMessage(DirectMessage dm)
      Deletes the specified direct message from the database.
      Parameters:
      dm - the direct message to delete

    • editDirectMessage

      public void editDirectMessage(Long directMessageId, String newText)
      Updates the text of the specified direct message.
      Parameters:
      directMessageId - the ID of the direct message to update
      newText - the new text for the direct message
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the specified direct message is not found
